mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDY_ROOM_NOTICE(POST_NO, USER_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_PASSWORD) VALUES(#{post_no}, #{user_no}, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, #{notice_password})
INSERT INTO STUDY_Moment(POST_NO, USER_NO, MOMENT_PICTURE, MOMENT_TITLE) VALUES(#{post_no}, #{user_no}, #{moment_picture}, #{moment_title})
INSERT INTO STUDY_ROOM_CALENDAR(POST_NO, USER_NO, TITLE, EVENT_DATE) VALUES(#{post_no}, #{user_no}, #{title}, #{todo_date})
INSERT INTO message (post_no, nickname, message) VALUES (#{post_no}, #{nickname}, #{message})
mapper.select: SELECT SM.*, U.nickname FROM STUDY_ROOM_NOTICE SM JOIN Users U ON SM.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE SM.POST_NO = #{post_no} ORDER BY notice_post_date DESC
SELECT SM.*,U.nickname FROM STUDY_MOMENT SM JOIN Users U ON SM.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE SM.POST_NO = #{post_no} ORDER BY moment_post_date DESC
SELECT * FROM message WHERE post_no = #{post_no} ORDER BY timestamp ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM STUDY_ROOM_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{notice_no} AND NOTICE_PASSWORD = #{notice_password}
DELETE FROM STUDY_MOMENT WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no} AND MOMENT_NO = #{moment_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE STUDY_POST SET STUDY_TITLE = #{study_title} WHERE post_no = #{post_no} AND user_no = #{user_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TODO (POST_NO,TODO_LIST, CHECKED, TODO_DATE) VALUES(#{post_no}, #{todo_list}, #{checked}, #{todo_date})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TODO WHERE POST_NO = #{post_no} AND TODO_DATE = #{todo_date}
mapper.update: UPDATE TODO SET TODO_LIST = #{todo_list} WHERE post_no =#{post_no} AND id=#{id} AND TODO_DATE = #{todo_date}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TODO WHERE post_no=#{post_no} AND id = #{id} AND TODO_DATE = #{todo_date}
